long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Botion Checker is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help website owners and developers identify and manage broken links across their web pages. With just a few clicks, you can scan your entire site and get a comprehensive report of all the links that need attention.
Features

Quick Scan: Analyze the current page for broken links instantly.
Deep Crawl: Perform a thorough scan of your entire website to find all broken internal and external links.
GitHub Pages Support: Automatically detect and switch between regular domains and GitHub Pages for seamless checking.
Detailed Reports: Get a clear, easy-to-understand report of all broken links, including their location and error status.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI makes it easy for anyone to use, regardless of technical expertise.

How to Use

Install the Botion Checker extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to the website you want to check.
Click on the Botion Checker icon in your browser toolbar.
Choose between a quick scan of the current page or a deep crawl of the entire site.
Review the report of broken links and take action to fix them.
